title: [Sponsor] Flatfile Portal
content:
Your application relies on ingesting customer data for it to provide value. And as an engineer, you’ve likely built a CSV importer from scratch to solve for this.

As enticing as it is to build a data importer compared to core product features, Flatfile is the turnkey solution.

Flatfile, the data onboarding platform, makes sense of the jumbled data your users import, and transforms it into the format your app relies on. Quickly deploy Flatfile into any environment and upgrade your customer’s data onboarding experience in minutes.

No building a data importer. No complex import scripts. No needing to build features into an aging, in-house data importer.

Ready to never build a CSV importer again?

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
